pages.text: 26|84|da-eum sedaeeseo jega uiloun jalo ib-e oleudolog hayeo jusoseo
26|85|chugbogbad-eun nag-won-ui sangsogjadeul jung-e han sangsogjaga doege hayeo juob soseo
26|86|jeoui abeojikke gwan-yong-eul bepul eo juobsoseo geubun-eun banghwanghaneun ja gaunde iss-eossnaida
26|87|buhwal doeneun nal bukkeuleobji anhneun jaga doege hayeo jusoseo
26|88|geunal-eun jaesando jasindo soyong i eobsneun nal-ibnida
26|89|geuleona jeongjighan ma-eum-eulo ha nanimkke oneun janeun je-oeigeoneul
26|90|jeongjighage saneun jadeul-eul wihae cheongug-i gakkai iss-eul geos-imyeo
26|91|saaghan jadeul-eul wihaeseoneun ji og-i natanal geos-ini
26|92|neohuiga sungbaehaneun sindeul-i eo di issneunyo lago geudeul-eun jilmun-eul bad eulila
26|93|hananim oee geugeosdeul-i neohui leul dobgeona seuseuloleul doul su issneunyo
26|94|i usangdeulgwa saaghan jadeul-eun meolileul ap-eulo hago boljiog-eulo deonjyeojil geos-imyeo
26|95|ibeulliseuui gundae modudo geu leohalila
26|96|geudeul-eun geu an-eseo seolo ssau myeonseo malhanani
26|97|hananim-iyeo jeohuiga sillo jal mos hayeossnaida
26|98|geuttae jeohuiga geugeos-eul man-yuui junimgwa dongdeunghan wichilo sungbaehayeossna ida
26|99|jeohuileul jalmos indohan janeun ba lo joeindeul-ieossseubnida
26|100|geulihayeo jeohuiegeneun jungjae jado eobs-eumyeo
26|101|gakkaun chingudo eobsnaida
26|102|jigeum jeohuiga dol-agal su iss neun gihuiga issdamyeon jeohuineun midneunja deul-i doeltende
26|103|sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani ha yeossdeola
26|104|sillo geudaeui junim-eun gwonneung-gwajabilo chungmanhasim-ila
26|105|noaui baegseongdeuldo seonjijadeul eul bujeonghaess-euni
26|106|geudeul-ui hyeongje noaga geudeul-ege malhaessdeola hananim-eul dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
26|107|sillo naega neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
26|108|geuleomeulo hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
26|109|naneun neohuiege geue daehan bosang-eul yoguhaji anihamae sillo naui bosang-eun man-yuui junimkkeseo ju sinila
26|110|geuleona hananim-eul dulyeowo hago na-ege sunjonghala
26|111|geudeul-i daedabhagil gajang mi cheonhan jadeul-i ttaleugo issneun neoleul mid eulan mal-inyo
